name: Webpack
description: A powerful and highly configurable module bundler for JavaScript applications. Webpack bundles assets, transforms code with loaders, and optimizes output for production.

name: Vite
description: A modern frontend build tool that offers lightning-fast development with native ES modules and an optimized production build powered by Rollup.

name: Parcel
description: A zero-config bundler that automatically installs plugins and transforms your code with built-in support for many languages and file types.

name: Rollup
description: An efficient JavaScript bundler designed for libraries and modern JavaScript projects. It produces smaller, faster code using ES module syntax.

name: Gulp
description: A streaming task runner that automates time-consuming development tasks such as minification, compilation, and live reloading via code-based pipelines.

name: Grunt
description: A JavaScript task runner that helps automate repetitive tasks in your workflow, like linting, compilation, and unit testing, using a plugin-based config.

name: Snowpack
description: A lightning-fast frontend build tool designed for the modern web. It leverages JavaScriptâ€™s native module system and delivers instant builds and updates.
